title: Best of The Herd for Jul 01, 2020

description:
Cam and the Patriots will only be fun if they win

The Lakers can't win the title this season

LeBron wanted to be a Knick in 2010 but they butchered it

Colin's top 10 coaches if he became a billionaire and bought an NFL team


Guest: Eric Mangini, former Jets & Browns Head Coach

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
